verses.t: Behold, bless{H1288} Lordye the {H3068}, all ye servants{H5650} Lordof the {H3068}, which by night{H3915} stand{H5975} in the house{H1004} Lordof the {H3068}.
Lift up{H5375} your hands{H3027} in the sanctuary{H6944}, and bless{H1288} Lordthe {H3068}.the sanctuary: or, holiness
LordThe {H3068} that made{H6213} heaven{H8064} and earth{H776} bless{H1288} thee out of Zion{H6726}.
